name: Pocket Squid Fishing
description:
Enjoy the most unique and relaxing fishing experience anytime anywhere with your iOS devices.

Experience the true joy of catching live squids and legendary sea creatures.

Your ultimate goal is to catch all species of marine life in the sea of Squido Island and complete the collections of Fishbook and Treasurepedia.

Features:
• Simple and unique gameplay mechanisms which are easy to learn and master.
• Explore 5 fishing spots with stunning underwater reef scenes.
• More than 50 species and 300+ types of marine life to catch.
• Up to 30 deep sea treasures waiting to be discovered.
• Environment seamlessly transitions between day and night according to actual time.
• Enjoy the view of colourful reef with marine life and sounds of sea waves crashing.
• Touch and interact with marine life in water.
• Life-like squid movements.
• Watch the live squids chasing and grabbing your bait in the water.
• Keep your catch in the fish tank. Feed and watch them feeding on small fishes.
• Share your catch on social media and help your friends to catch one too.
• No internet connection required. Play anytime anywhere.

Enjoy your fishing vacation 365 days a year!
